title: A step closer to death
content:
I'm now 20. I can't believe it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]

Edit: Local time, at least. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: A step closer to death
content:
Well congratamutations Mr.Rush! I didn't know you were born so close to my birthday.

One month and one day older than me to be precise. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

20. The age where there is absolutely no reason to celebrate because you still can't drink yet... Have a nice dry party. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] -----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Stairway to H311
content:
Hmm, I was just partaking in a conversation with some friends last night about how many people we know have their birthday during June, particularly around the 7th. There's another to add to the list.

Happy 20day!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img]

[hr]Gal 20. The age where there is absolutely no reason to celebrate because you still can't drink yet...
[hr]Heh, I'll never get used to those crazy overseas alcolol laws.
